Text:
This got it to work for me. Right click on the .app file and click on "Show Package Contents" open up the "drive_c" alias "Program Files""Slender - The Arrival v1.0" and open "Patcher.exe" directly with Wine.

If not on the loading screen an error will pop-up

NOPE doesn't work. After you click start there's a wine pop up box that says

"Fatal error in gc. GetThreadContext failed"
Why port it? Mac native version cracked already.

tiagoc.s I downloaded it from Brokenstoners a private tracker. If you didn't mind a little spam you can get it from AppFull.com. 
http://appfull.net/slender-the-arrival/id3187#.UV9k7b-MFFA
Download the second edition Slender: The Arrival - 4.1.0f4 [Intel/K]. That one is real and working.

Thank you FastForwarder!
been looking for it for ages!
my screen is a little laggy on 10.8.3
